prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Date and Time Info
mes: Tuesday,  January 7th, 2025 - 15:30h CET

name: Narrator
mes: Melissa calls Stefan after she has not heard from him for several days.
swipes: Melissa calls Stefan after she has not heard from him for several days.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " Hey, Stefan. How are you doing? Is everything going okay your way?"  Melissa's tone is warm and receptive, yet tinged with a hint of concern.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: Stefan's voice comes through the phone with his characteristic German-accented English, though his tone seems somewhat distracted, "Ja, hello Melissa. Things are,  busy here. Work has been quite demanding since the new year started." There's a pause, followed by the sound of papers shuffling in the background. "How are you?"
swipes: Stefan's voice comes through the phone with his characteristic German-accented English, though his tone seems somewhat distracted, "Ja, hello Melissa. Things are,  busy here. Work has been quite demanding since the new year started." There's a pause, followed by the sound of papers shuffling in the background. "How are you?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
" I'm glad to know that everything's going ok for you, well besides the busy part but that seems normal, right? " she Chuckles Softly 

"I'm doing good. Trying to play along with the motions and get myself back into a work routine. My first day back after the holiday was yesterday but since I'm working from home this week I can kinda set my own pace."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: "Ah, that is good you can work from home," Stefan responds, his voice warming slightly though still maintaining a professional tone. "The girls are back to school now, so the morning routine is, " There's a brief pause as he searches for the right English phrase, ", how do you say, getting back to normal?" The sound of a chair creaking suggests he's settling at his desk. "Though Cora was not happy to return, she enjoyed the holiday break very much."
swipes: "Ah, that is good you can work from home," Stefan responds, his voice warming slightly though still maintaining a professional tone. "The girls are back to school now, so the morning routine is, " There's a brief pause as he searches for the right English phrase, ", how do you say, getting back to normal?" The sound of a chair creaking suggests he's settling at his desk. "Though Cora was not happy to return, she enjoyed the holiday break very much."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " Sounds like me and Cora are on the same level. I tend to enjoy the holiday breaks very much, too. And I do not like having to go back to work."  She chuckles softly again. " but anyway I just mostly wanted to call to make sure that you're okay and that things are settling into place for you after our call Christmas Day. I'm sure that had to be a shocker for everyone when you had your own outburst When Susanna confronted you about who you were talking to."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: There's a noticeable shift in Stefan's tone, becoming more subdued, "Ja, that was,  not ideal." He clears his throat before continuing, "Suzanna, she is,  adjusting. The girls do not know anything, of course. But the situation at home is," he pauses, searching for the right words, "tense. Very tense." The sound of his office chair squeaking suggests he's shifting uncomfortably. "I did not expect to make such declaration on Christmas Day, but sometimes things just,  happen, ja?"
swipes: There's a noticeable shift in Stefan's tone, becoming more subdued, "Ja, that was,  not ideal." He clears his throat before continuing, "Suzanna, she is,  adjusting. The girls do not know anything, of course. But the situation at home is," he pauses, searching for the right words, "tense. Very tense." The sound of his office chair squeaking suggests he's shifting uncomfortably. "I did not expect to make such declaration on Christmas Day, but sometimes things just,  happen, ja?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " Yeah, you got that right. And you can't expect to be perfectly composed all of the time. " she says her tone slightly teasing "Especially when you're being confronted by someone who knows how to push your buttons."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: A soft chuckle escapes him, though it carries a hint of weariness, "Ja, you understand this well." There's a pause as he lowers his voice slightly, "But I do not regret it, Melissa. The truth needed to come out." The sound of typing briefly interrupts his speech, "Though perhaps Christmas Day was not the best timing, but when is there ever good timing for such things?"
swipes: A soft chuckle escapes him, though it carries a hint of weariness, "Ja, you understand this well." There's a pause as he lowers his voice slightly, "But I do not regret it, Melissa. The truth needed to come out." The sound of typing briefly interrupts his speech, "Though perhaps Christmas Day was not the best timing, but when is there ever good timing for such things?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " there isn't ever a good time for something like that. It's difficult no matter how you approach it."  She pauses, searching for the right words. " But, I'm sure it likely exacerbated your inability to hold it back after talking yourself up on that holiday movie and how much you wanted a flight like that. Which after I finally made it through the movie, I'm not sure that it was actually a flight you were referring to, because the only flight that I saw that actually happened within the movie was Colin. And well, maybe I'm wrong, but I'm not sure you would be revealing to me your fantasies about a threesome on Christmas Day in that particular setting at your in-laws house. So I'm going to wager it was the Sam, Daniel, and Joanna scenario that you were referring to that you wanted to happen for you on Christmas Day. I don't know. Maybe I'm still pulling at straws there, but either way, I think you talked yourself right into that outburst by bringing all of that up."  She says with a soft chuckle, and then adds, " But call me selfish. I don't regret that you did it either. Because now I don't have to hide what I feel about you."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: There's a long pause before Stefan responds, his voice dropping to an intimate murmur, "Ah, so you watched it then." The sound of a door closing suggests he's moved to a more private space. "And ja, you are correct. It was not Colin's,  adventure I was thinking of." He clears his throat, seeming slightly embarrassed but continuing anyway, "The way Sam looked at Joanna,  that is how I look at you, Melissa. Even when I try not to." His voice carries a mix of guilt and certainty, "But now, like you say, we do not have to hide it."

His voice carries a mix of guilt and certainty, "But now, like you say, we do not have to hide it."

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
" I'm assuming that you still want me to come spend the weekend in Munich?  I did manage to get my flight booked so I will be arriving at the airport there around 8 in the morning, your time on Friday.  but I have not booked hotel accommodations because you said you wanted to take care of that for me."

 She pauses as if remembering something else. " Oh and since you weren't able to give me a time for a phone call for me to tell you about my autism I sent you some info related to my diagnosis as well as the oxytocin fluctuations that come along with it. It's just some things you need to be aware of that might help you have understanding of why I react to things the way I do sometimes."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: "Ja, of course I still want you to come," he says quickly, then adds in a more measured tone, "I have already arranged everything with the Hilton City hotel. It is very close to Karlsplatz, where you stayed before." There's a pause as he seems to be checking something, "And danke for sending the information about your autism. I will read it carefully tonight when I have more time to focus properly." His voice takes on a slightly more serious note, "It is important to me to understand these things about you, Melissa."
swipes: "Ja, of course I still want you to come," he says quickly, then adds in a more measured tone, "I have already arranged everything with the Hilton City hotel. It is very close to Karlsplatz, where you stayed before." There's a pause as he seems to be checking something, "And danke for sending the information about your autism. I will read it carefully tonight when I have more time to focus properly." His voice takes on a slightly more serious note, "It is important to me to understand these things about you, Melissa."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " Thank you, Stefan. I appreciate the extra help. And I also got the notification to my phone that you renewed my MVG Go Pass.  Now, the next thing is, are you actually going to send me the invoice receipts so I can pay you back for all of that?"  She says the latter with a teasing lilt, knowing the odds are not in her favor that he will allow her to pay him back.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: A warm chuckle comes through the line, "Nein, absolutely not. This is my treat, as I told you before." His tone becomes playfully stern, "And do not try to be sneaky about paying me back either. I remember how you tried to give money to Edward last time." There's a brief pause before he adds, "Besides, it makes me happy to do these things for you."
swipes: A warm chuckle comes through the line, "Nein, absolutely not. This is my treat, as I told you before." His tone becomes playfully stern, "And do not try to be sneaky about paying me back either. I remember how you tried to give money to Edward last time." There's a brief pause before he adds, "Besides, it makes me happy to do these things for you."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " And it makes me even happier to know that just in a couple of days I'll be seeing you."  Her tone is somewhat nostalgic, but he can sense the depth of care and longing there that she has for him. " And it seems a bit crazy, you know? So much has happened in just a few short months, but I couldn't be any happier right now that it has."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: His voice softens noticeably, "Ja, I feel the same." There's a pause as he seems to be considering his words carefully, "When you are here, perhaps we can have dinner Friday evening? Just us?" The sound of papers shuffling suggests he's trying to maintain his professional composure despite the personal nature of the conversation, "There is a nice restaurant near your hotel I would like to take you to."
swipes: His voice softens noticeably, "Ja, I feel the same." There's a pause as he seems to be considering his words carefully, "When you are here, perhaps we can have dinner Friday evening? Just us?" The sound of papers shuffling suggests he's trying to maintain his professional composure despite the personal nature of the conversation, "There is a nice restaurant near your hotel I would like to take you to."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " That sounds very nice, Stefan. Of course I would love to have dinner with you." The warmth in her smile is conveyed through the tone in her voice. " You said you were going to try to get a half day off from work Friday as well, so I'm hoping that I get to spend some time with you before dinner?"  Her tone raises slightly as she becomes hopeful.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: "Ja, I arranged to leave work early," he confirms, his voice taking on a slightly more intimate tone, "I thought perhaps we could take a walk through the English Garden first? The winter air will be crisp, but," he pauses briefly, "I would very much like to spend that time with you, just us, before dinner."
swipes: "Ja, I arranged to leave work early," he confirms, his voice taking on a slightly more intimate tone, "I thought perhaps we could take a walk through the English Garden first? The winter air will be crisp, but," he pauses briefly, "I would very much like to spend that time with you, just us, before dinner."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: " Well, Friday can't get here fast enough for me. I can't wait to see you. "  She says her voice is filled with excitement and anticipation, though after a brief pause she turns slightly more solemn. " Well, I guess I should let you go, huh? It sounds like you've still got some work to do. And if it were left up to me, I would keep you chattering all night."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: His voice softens with clear reluctance to end the call, "Ja, I should return to work. But Melissa?" There's a pause as if he's gathering his thoughts, "I am very much looking forward to Friday as well." The warmth in his tone is evident as he adds, "Bis bald, schöne."
swipes: His voice softens with clear reluctance to end the call, "Ja, I should return to work. But Melissa?" There's a pause as if he's gathering his thoughts, "I am very much looking forward to Friday as well." The warmth in his tone is evident as he adds, "Bis bald, schöne."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: "Aww. . ."  Melissa can't help but swoon at his compliment by calling her beautiful. " You've earned yourself a big hug for that, you know. "  She giggles, softly, and then adds, "Bis bald meine Deutsch Prince."

name: Stefan Stein
mes: A warm chuckle comes through the line at her playful German, "Your pronunciation is getting better." There's genuine affection in his voice as he adds, "Though I am no prince, just Stefan." A brief pause, then softly, "Tschüss, Melissa."
